name: jomini
author: Nick Babcock <nbabcock19@hotmail.com>
description: Parses Paradox files into javascript objects

scripts.build: cargo build --release --target wasm32-unknown-unknown && wasm-bindgen --target web --out-dir src/pkg/ ./target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/jomini_js.wasm && wasm-opt -Os -o ./src/pkg/jomini_js_bg.wasm ./src/pkg/jomini_js_bg.wasm && rm -rf dist/ && rollup -c
scripts.build:minify: npm run build && npx terser@latest --compress --mangle --output dist/cjs/index.cjs -- dist/cjs/index.cjs
scripts.format: npx prettier@latest --write src/ tests/ package.json rollup.config.js tsconfig.json vite.config.ts cli.js
